title: Pokemon knockoff
description: An example of map generation & sprite generation with D3.js.

title: Stickie

title: Brick & Mortar
description: A concept project that finds nearby volunteer work and information.

title: Soundsteer.ai
description: An AI music management platform developed with React, Supabase, and Flask.
content: This project began in collaboration with Brandon Hresko as a single idea: how can we let artists spend more time doing the stuff they like to do (making art) and less time doing menial tasks like scheduling content?
